title: DPM Ishaq Dar condoles over death of Iranian president, foreign minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 20 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Ishaq Dar on Monday expressed sadness over the death of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian in a helicopter crash.
The deputy prime minister wrote on X that in the recent visit to Pakistan, late President Raisi played an instrumental role in solidifying Pakistan-Iran ties.
His services to the Iranian nation will always be cherished, he remarked and prayed for eternal peace to the departed souls.
